tool_description: General API to be used for together with other APIs that based on various sports
name: Global Data
title: Global Data

api_list.name: Country List
api_list.description: Provides the list of the countries which belong to the tournaments.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-data.p.rapidapi.com/country/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
